participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and family-oriented, Emily enjoys quiet moments and cherishes her time with loved ones.
participant_1.background: my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i walk three miles every day. i'm a baby delivery nurse. i love to spend time with my family.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and sociable, James has a passion for sharing knowledge and experiences with others.
participant_2.background: i've a big library at home. i am a museum tour guide. i am partly deaf. i love to drink fancy tea.
